agent_response: To enroll in the CS 6140 Machine Learning course, you need to complete either one of the following combinations of prerequisites: ((DS 4100 with a minimum grade of D- or DS 3000 with a minimum grade of D- ); (CS 2810 with a minimum grade of D- or ECON 2350 with a minimum grade of D- or ENVR 2500 with a minimum grade of D- or MATH 3081 with a minimum grade of D- or MGSC 2301 with a minimum grade of D- or PHTH 2210 with a minimum grade of D- or PSYC 2320 with a minimum grade of D- )) or (CS 2810 with a minimum grade of D- ; CS 3500 with a minimum grade of D- ).

user_message: What is the course title and course description for course code DS 3000 in Data Science program?
agent_response: The course title for course code DS 3000 is "Foundations of Data Science" and the course description is that it introduces core modern data science technologies and methods that provide a foundation for subsequent Data Science classes, covering topics such as working with tensors, processing and integrating data, introductory concepts in probability and statistics, basic data visualization techniques, and standard data science tools like Jupyter notebooks.

user_message: What are the prerequisite courses for INFO 6150 in Information Systems program?
agent_response: The prerequisite course for INFO 6150 in Information Systems program is INFO 5100 with a minimum grade of B-.
